original_text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts, he answering said unto them, What reason ye in your hearts?
korean_text: 예수께서 그 생각을 아시고 대답하여 이르시되 너희 마음에 무슨 생각을 하느냐

sentences.original_text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 예수께서 그들의 생각을 아셨을 때

sentences.original_text: What reason ye in your hearts?
